name: Anju's Quest
description:
To Katie

Queen of cats, Anju, resides deep in the jungle and you happen to stumble upon her presence. She has a favor to ask of you... Will you be able to  complete her quest?

Anju's Quest is a single fetch quest game inspired by Cartoon Katie's cat, Anju. It started out as a simple commission that turned into a simple game. This is the first game that I have created from start to finish. Enjoy <3

-Mae Adao
